title: ‘The Studio’ Season 2 Starts Filming Next Week, Seth Rogen Confirms
summary: Fresh off its Golden Globe win for best comedy or musical TV series, Apple TV’s “The Studio” is heading back behind the cameras next week. That’s the word from series star and executive producer Seth Rogen, who told press backstage at Sunday’s kudocast. Episode 8 of the Lionsgate-produced series’ S…

title: Hudson Williams’ Serpent Necklace Was a Nod to His Own Snake Tattoo
summary: For Hudson Williams, the Golden Globes is a finale of sorts to a hall-of-fame press tour since shooting to global stardom as Shane Hollander in “Heated Rivalry.” The newly appointed heartthrob of Hollywood met the moment on Sunday night, wearing a Georgio Armani white suit jacket styled with an ope…

title: Golden Globes Snubs and Surprises: Ryan Coogler’s ‘Sinners’ Script Passed Over; Teyana Taylor and Wagner Moura Triumph and More
summary: The Golden Globes are over, but we still have a few burning questions: What stars took most advantage of the open bar? How many “Heated Rivalry” jokes were cut?
